title: What are the etiology of all possible phenomenology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you mean the cause of the emergence of phenomenology? It is naivety of thinking that any explanation can be formatted in atoms, electrons, protons, waves etc. Reality cannot be thought of like this, everything would be very boring. Imagine a surfer thinking what a beautiful wave, what a blue sky and sea, thinking in terms of atoms, wavelengths. It's sad
